quote: Don't forget to smile in any situation. As long as you are alive, there will be better things later, and there will be many.
description: Bellmere's final advice to Nami and Nojiko

quote: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day eventually.
description: Brook's philosophical observation about hope and perseverance

quote: What keeps me alive in this world is neither bodily organs nor muscles. It's my soul.
description: Brook explaining what truly keeps him going as a skeleton

quote: You are now... truly free.
description: Corazon's final thoughts about Law being liberated

quote: Pirates are evil? The Marines are righteous? Justice will prevail, you say? But of course it will! Whoever wins this war becomes justice!
description: Doflamingo's cynical view of justice and morality

quote: When do you think people die? When they are shot through the heart by the bullet of a pistol? No. When they are ravaged by an incurable disease? No. It's when they are forgotten!
description: Dr. Hiluluk's philosophy about death and memory

quote: There's no disease that can't be cured by laughter!
description: Dr. Hiluluk's belief in the healing power of joy

quote: It's still too early for you to die. Discover your true self, the true world, become stronger!
description: Mihawk challenging Zoro to grow stronger after their duel

quote: ONE PIECE IS REAL!
description: Whitebeard's declaration confirming the existence of the treasure before his death

quote: A man's dream never dies!
description: Whitebeard echoing the importance of dreams even in death

quote: Just being alive isn't a sin! There's no crime in living!
description: Franky defending the right to exist during the Enies Lobby arc

quote: I'm sorry. I wanted to carry you further. I wanted to go on more adventures with you.
description: The Going Merry's emotional farewell to the Straw Hat crew

quote: You want my treasure? You can have it! I left everything I gathered together in one place. Now you just have to find it!
description: Roger's final words that started the Great Pirate Era

quote: You might be alone at the moment... But someday... You'll definitely find nakama! No one is born in this world to be alone!
description: Saul encouraging young Robin about finding friends

quote: What is your true nature? There is no shame in being weak. The shame is in staying weak!
description: Jinbe encouraging growth and self-improvement

quote: A man's dream will never die!
description: Blackbeard's declaration about the eternal nature of dreams

quote: I'm the man who's going to be the Pirate King!
description: Luffy's signature declaration of his dream throughout the series

quote: This isn't my place to die!
description: Luffy's determination during his fight against Don Krieg

quote: You made our navigator cry.
description: Luffy confronting Arlong about making Nami cry

quote: Maybe I can't do anything... but I have friends who will rescue me
description: Luffy acknowledging his reliance on his crew during the fight with Arlong

quote: I don't care if you're a king or not. There are things that matter more than power.
description: Luffy speaking to Wapol during the Drum Island Arc about values beyond power

quote: Being alone hurts worse than pain.
description: Luffy expressing the pain of loneliness

quote: I love heroes, but I don't want to be one. Do you even know what a hero is? For example, you have some meat. Pirates will feast on the meat, but the hero will distribute it among the people! I want to eat the meat!
description: Luffy explaining why he doesn't want to be a hero

quote: Say you want to live!
description: Luffy demanding Robin to express her will to live during the Enies Lobby arc

quote: I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean is the Pirate King!
description: Luffy explains his definition of what it means to be the Pirate King to Rayleigh

quote: I won't go on a boring adventure!
description: Luffy refusing to learn about the One Piece from Rayleigh

quote: If I give up now, I'll regret it forever!
description: Luffy's determination during the Marineford War while trying to rescue Ace

quote: Without your help, I can't become the King of the Pirates!
description: Luffy telling Sanji how much he needs him during their confrontation at Whole Cake Island

quote: Once we're dead, the only thing that is left is bones.
description: Luffy's philosophical moment during his battle with Kaido

quote: Luffy... help me!
description: Nami finally asking for help from Luffy at Arlong Park

quote: I want to live!
description: Robin's emotional declaration of her will to live during the Enies Lobby arc

quote: The government says your existence is a crime, but no matter what kind of weapons you may hold, just being alive isn't a sin!
description: Robin defending the right to exist

quote: I don't want to live for a thousand years. If I just live through today, that'll be enough.
description: Ace rejecting the offer of longevity in favor of living in the present

quote: Thank you for loving me!
description: Ace's final words expressing gratitude to his crew and Luffy

quote: There's only one way to live life, and that's without regrets.
description: Ace's philosophy on living life to the fullest

quote: Scars on the back are a swordsman's shame.
description: Zoro facing Mihawk with honor, refusing to turn his back even in defeat

quote: Only I can call my dream stupid!
description: Zoro defending his dream to become the world's strongest swordsman from Sanji's mockery

quote: When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back.
description: Zoro's philosophy about facing adversity head-on

quote: If I can't even protect my captain's dream, then whatever ambition I have is nothing but talk!
description: Zoro expressing his loyalty to Luffy and his determination to protect his captain's dream

quote: Nothing happened.
description: Zoro's stoic response after taking all of Luffy's pain from Kuma at Thriller Bark

quote: If I die here, then I'm a man that could only make it this far.
description: Zoro accepting potential death with dignity during Thriller Bark

quote: I'll do what you can't do, you do what I can't do.
description: Sanji expressing teamwork philosophy during a difficult situation

quote: I would never kick a woman, even if it kills me!
description: Sanji's chivalrous code even when fighting Kalifa at Enies Lobby

quote: You can pour drinks on me, even spit on me. I'll just laugh about it. But if you dare to hurt my friends... I won't forgive you!
description: Shanks showing his protective nature towards his friends

quote: I'll become a doctor who can cure any disease!
description: Chopper declaring his dream inspired by Dr. Hiluluk

quote: I realized that back then, the reason I wanted to become human was that I really just wanted friends. Now, I just want to be a monster that can help Luffy!
description: Chopper reflecting on his true desires and loyalty to his captain

quote: I want to be the sort of man people can rely on!
description: Chopper expressing his desire to be dependable

quote: There comes a time when a man must stand and fight! And that is when his friends' dreams are being laughed at!
description: Usopp standing up for his friends' dreams during the Alabasta arc

quote: Don't start a fight if you can't end it.
description: Sanji's advice about taking responsibility for one's actions
